title: Short-Intensive Training Course for Strengthening Science Practice Competencies Based on OMO (Online-Merge-Offline)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended learning utilizing digital devices in smart classroom environments, aimed at enhancing job-applicable competencies for current science professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can perform real-time collaborative tasks with over 85% participation in OMO (Online-Merge-Offline) environments
Learners achieve over 90% of weekly learning objectives through the ubiquitous learning model
Learners can write three or more self-directed feedback reports based on data analysis results using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
